title: Blended Learning Course for Developing Mathematics Teaching Expertise for Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Design of a math education expertise enhancement program for pre-service teachers or undergraduates interested in education

learning_goals: Learners can explore and explain at least three mathematical principles using a mathematical concept visualization tool.
Learners can design at least two applicable mathematics teaching strategies for real classroom situations through collaborative workshops with peer teachers.
Learners can analyze mathematics educational materials independently at least once a week via an online learning platform and write reflective journals.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
